title: Buying skins in champ select
body: Why is it that you can no longer buy skins in (Rank) Champion select.... You can still do it in normal but who even plays normal!!!! I would love to buy a skin in champ select please Riot.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is a known bug with new champ select and is being worked on, please see [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select) for more information on known issues related to New Champ Select.
